title: Chargrilled sea bass summer rolls with pineapple dipping sauce
description: These fresh spring rolls are easy to make in advance for a summer barbecue and a world away from deep-fried takeaway versions.
ingredients: 100g/3oz rice vermicelli, cooked according to the packet instructions
½ pineapple, peel and core removed, cut into thin matchsticks
1 cucumber, seeds removed, cut into thin matchsticks
1 bunch fresh dill, torn into small sprigs
250g/8oz fresh pineapple, crushed or blended to a rough purée
